MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the CH7 postcode area of Northop, affecting properties in Church Road and surrounding streets.  We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:48 am.  In order to complete repairs, engineers on site need to isolate the power to other properties and we expect the power to be restored by 3 pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:49 pm on 8th December, 2020.
